title: Did Bannon say he put Fashie's head and the FBI director in Peeks?
subtitle: The Executive Director of Podcast and Britt were described as loyal to Trump.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The campaign adviser invited former US President Donald Trump Steve Bannon to "a second period" to start shooting by NIH Director Dr. Anthony Fossie and FBI Director Christopher Ray, adding that he would put their "heads on shares" as a warning.
